title: SOCS Description Builder
description: An interactive MicroSim where students compose complete distribution descriptions using the SOCS framework (Shape, Outliers, Center, Spread) by analyzing histograms and selecting appropriate characteristics from dropdowns, then comparing their descriptions to expert responses.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Statistics
Data Analysis
Distribution Description
SOCS Framework
Histograms
learningObjective: Students will compose complete distribution descriptions using the SOCS framework by analyzing histograms and selecting appropriate shape, outlier, center, and spread characteristics.

dropdowns.name: Shape
dropdowns.purpose: Select the overall shape of the distribution

dropdowns.name: Modality
dropdowns.purpose: Select the number of peaks in the distribution

dropdowns.name: Outliers
dropdowns.purpose: Identify the presence and location of outliers

inputs.name: Center
inputs.purpose: Enter an estimate for the center (median) of the distribution

inputs.name: Spread
inputs.purpose: Enter an estimate for the spread (IQR) of the distribution

buttons.name: New Dataset
buttons.action: Generates a new random dataset with context

buttons.name: Generate Description
buttons.action: Validates selections and shows the composed description

buttons.name: Compare to Expert
buttons.action: Shows expert description and scores the student response
